body_html:
I built a new PyTorch master wheel for Python 3.7 with today's (November 4, 2018) code. This is fully CUDA 10 based. I also linked with a new CUDA 10 build of magma.

Blog post with more instructions here: https://vxlabs.com/2018/11/04/pytorch-1-0-preview-nov-4-2018-packages-with-full-cuda-10-support-for-your-ubuntu-18-04-x86_64-systems/ (0% ads, only content)

body:
I built a new PyTorch master wheel for Python 3.7 with today's (November 4, 2018) code. This is fully CUDA 10 based. I also linked with a new CUDA 10 build of magma.

Blog post with more instructions here: https://vxlabs.com/2018/11/04/pytorch-1-0-preview-nov-4-2018-packages-with-full-cuda-10-support-for-your-ubuntu-18-04-x86_64-systems/ (0% ads, only content)
